page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: TYPES Most farm houses are upwards of 100 years old. All bungalows are post-1919, most are post-1945.Many are dormers, some have had dormers added. These are found as detached or semis.2-storey houses are either detached, semis or terraces and are of all ages. PRIVATELY OWNED Including farms, about 80% of the houses fall into this category. Several are under construction as this survey is being pepared. There are no Building Societies, etc. in the block, but there are several in nearby Kirkham. COUNCIL PROPERTY 20% of the houses were put up by the council, but since their erection, several have been bought by the occupant.Practically all council houses are post-1945 and over 90% are terraced.
